languages.text: "Оставлять аколитов в неведении касательно всех планов — резонная тактика. Только это сдерживает мое изумление действиями Лорд-инквизитора".
"Keeping acolytes ignorant of all plans is a legitimate tactic. It is the only thing tempering my shock at the Lord Inquisitor's actions."
languages.original_text: "Оставлять аколитов в неведении касательно всех планов — резонная тактика. Только это сдерживает мое изумление действиями Лорд-инквизитора".

traits.locale_text: "Keeping acolytes ignorant of all plans is a legitimate tactic. It is the only thing tempering my shock at the Lord Inquisitor's actions."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Keeping acolytes ignorant of all plans is a legitimate tactic. It is the only thing tempering my shock at the Lord Inquisitor's actions."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Keeping acolytes ignorant of all plans is a legitimate tactic. It is the only thing tempering my shock at the Lord Inquisitor's actions."

traits.locale_text: "Keeping acolytes ignorant of all plans is a legitimate tactic. It is the only thing tempering my shock at the Lord Inquisitor's actions."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “对审判官来说，要保证侍仆对自己的计划一知半解，这才是合理的策略。只有以这种方式来思考大审判官的行为，我心中的震惊才能稍稍缓解。”
languages.original_text: "Keeping acolytes ignorant of all plans is a legitimate tactic. It is the only thing tempering my shock at the Lord Inquisitor's actions."

traits.locale_text: “对审判官来说，要保证侍仆对自己的计划一知半解，这才是合理的策略。只有以这种方式来思考审判长的行为，我心中的震惊才能稍稍缓解。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Ne pas tenir ses acolytes informés de tous ses plans est une stratégie parfaitement légitime. C'est la seule raison pour laquelle je ne suis pas profondément choqué par les actions du seigneur inquisiteur. »
languages.original_text: "Keeping acolytes ignorant of all plans is a legitimate tactic. It is the only thing tempering my shock at the Lord Inquisitor's actions."

traits.locale_text: « Ne pas tenir ses acolytes informés de tous ses plans est une stratégie parfaitement légitime. C'est la seule raison pour laquelle je ne suis pas profondément choqué par les actions du seigneur inquisiteur. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Ocultar los planes a los acólitos es una táctica legítima. Es lo único que templa mi indignación ante las acciones del Lord Inquisidor».
languages.original_text: "Keeping acolytes ignorant of all plans is a legitimate tactic. It is the only thing tempering my shock at the Lord Inquisitor's actions."

traits.locale_text: «Ocultar los planes a los acólitos es una táctica legítima. Es lo único que templa mi indignación ante las acciones del Lord Inquisidor».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「あらゆる計画からアコライトを除外し続けるのが合理的な戦術だ。ロード・インクィジターの行いに衝撃を受けた俺が落ち着くには、それしかない」
languages.original_text: "Keeping acolytes ignorant of all plans is a legitimate tactic. It is the only thing tempering my shock at the Lord Inquisitor's actions."

traits.locale_text: 「あらゆる計画からアコライトを除外し続けるのが合理的な戦術だ。ロード・インクィジターの行いに衝撃を受けた俺が落ち着くには、それしかない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Akolythen nicht in die wahren Pläne einzuweihen, ist eine legitime Taktik. Das ist das Einzige, was mein Entsetzen über das Verhalten des Großinquisitors ein wenig lindert."
languages.original_text: "Keeping acolytes ignorant of all plans is a legitimate tactic. It is the only thing tempering my shock at the Lord Inquisitor's actions."

traits.locale_text: "Akolythen nicht in die wahren Pläne einzuweihen, ist eine legitime Taktik. Das ist das Einzige, was mein Entsetzen über das Verhalten des Großinquisitors ein wenig lindert."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Keeping acolytes ignorant of all plans is a legitimate tactic. It is the only thing tempering my shock at the Lord Inquisitor's actions."

languages.text: "Havarileri yapılan planlardan bihaber bırakmak, geçerli bir taktiktir. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun eylemlerinin yaşattığı şoku hafifleten tek şey bu."
languages.original_text: "Keeping acolytes ignorant of all plans is a legitimate tactic. It is the only thing tempering my shock at the Lord Inquisitor's actions."

traits.locale_text: "Havarileri yapılan planlardan bihaber bırakmak geçerli bir taktiktir. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun eylemlerine karşı yaşadığım şoku hafifleten tek şey bu."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
